author: karim

review: For me & my Netflix subscription, this little piece of technology has been being used almost 24/7 since I bought it as a Christmas present for myself. I absolutely love this gadget! I even bought one for my parents to use. Dad usually watches what he wants, so now Mom gets to watch what she wants on their other large screen. She loves it as much as I do!!
author: Munch64

review: Its OK but it does not have YUPPTV and that was one of the reasons why I bought Chromecast. Otherwise, it's easy to stream Youtube from your tablet or phone onto your TV.Paid $35 but this routinely sells for $20 or so when you look for coupons online.
author: Tampaite
